category: news
title: "State Collection Services Names Sameer Maini as Chief Information Officer"
excerpt: "State Collection Services Inc., an ACA member company based in Madison, Wisconsin, has announced Sameer Maini as its chief information officer. He joins the company’s executive team with the goal of increasing recoveries and patient satisfaction for State’s clients through technology initiatives designed to improve and modernize the patient financial experience."
